author: {'steamid': '76561198374513314', 'num_games_owned': 417, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1629980936}
review:
游戏刚出的时候我还是个小学六年级的女生，下意识当做恋爱游戏来玩。
    与不良少年光星结婚的结局中，两人站在辽阔的蒙古草原上，听他征服世界的野望——讨好统治这里的天朝军阀，等他们降低警觉时发动政变夺回蒙古自治权。劝说亚洲各国领袖，改用统一货币创造一个大亚洲联盟。一个凌驾于欧盟和美国之上的大经济圈就此诞生。那些洋人们一定会气得颤抖，故意向我们挑衅。东西两半球间的经济战争就这样爆发了。用尽一切的手段来击垮西洋经济。让那些家伙们的货币变成废纸。就可以藉此正式成为世界总统。（现在看很有惨痛的历史既视感）
我当时完完全全被震住了——这种极度膨胀的诱惑让我少女心狂跳不止，真的陷入恋爱了！一度狂热地盯着蹲守在校门外的社会不良分子，想看看谁是能带我统治世界的好苗子——然鹅据我暗中观察，这些现实中的社会不良分子连蒙古在哪儿都不清楚，真的是失望。
    不过光星想要效仿成吉思汗以蒙古为起点征服世界的梦想还是扎根在了我心里，多年以后，当王国风云2出游牧之王dlc的时候我毫不犹豫就买了，重温到了少女时期春心萌动的感受。

author: {'steamid': '76561198843051411', 'num_games_owned': 518, 'num_reviews': 1147, 'playtime_forever': 697, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 689, 'last_played': 1561376068}
review:
首先感谢黄油大师组和制作人给予我评测这款《Princess Maker 5》的机会，美少女梦工厂的名头我早已耳闻许久，上起手来发现确实非常值得称赞的一款游戏。

[h1] 与美少女梦工厂之间的缘分[/h1]

最先知道这款游戏是因为《地下城与勇士》之中出现了养女儿的活动，一共可以获得10张不同的卡片，当时群里有大佬表示比《美少女梦工厂》差远了，后来因为《地下城与勇士》先是25仔传说，再是轮流造神，评测者不堪其扰，充值购买了《杀戮尖塔》开始了steam生涯——《美少女梦工厂》可以说是当初评测者非常感兴趣，但是实在听名字就不太想购买的一部作品（[spoiler]一个男人养女儿什么的实在太尴尬了，有那么多好玩儿游戏可以选择，实在是不好下手[/spoiler]）。

今天能够获得黄油大师组和制作人给予我评测的机会，也可以说是一场圆梦之旅吧？

作为一名评测者，我给予这款游戏一个9分的评价，养女儿真有趣，可惜我还是一只单身狗。

[h1]游戏的背景和主线剧情[/h1]

这款游戏游戏的背景是勇士退役过上了平静的生活，结果曾经生活过得王国发生动乱小公主被送到勇士的手中进行培养，培养的时间一共是8年，女儿根据期间培养的花样不同而走向了不同的方向（[spoiler]说起来的话，娼妇/妓女线可真是恶堕啊！[/spoiler]）。虽然说是有着娼妇般的恶堕选项，但是实际上不是为了全成就根本舍不得解锁——总而言之，在游戏中你差不多能够做几乎所有可能的女儿培养路线选项（/spoiler]为什么没有医生护士兔女郎路线，一脸鬼父态[/spoiler]），为女儿准备一个可能光明或者灰暗的未来。

[h1]游戏中丰富的活动内容[/h1]

在游戏中，女儿来到身边之后你可以让她打工，培养她艺术爱好，让她上学的同时去做义工，去健身房锻炼身体，去做一些乱七八糟的事情，还可以给她送各种礼物，过生日，办宴会，换衣服，搞活动——以及去开展战斗冒险（主线相关）。

游戏的cg和cv阵营也相当的丰富，30多人几乎个个有cv，个个有cg，很多时候多多存分支档有益身健健康，不然错过一些关键剧情就很可惜。

[h1]值得注意的其他信息：[/h1]

值得注意的是，除了女儿的培养之外，你还需要注意一些其他信息：

女儿的养育开支——要恰饭的啦，连女儿的打工费都不放过，是真的鬼畜呢！

女儿的朋友关系——知道什么叫做朋友之间的嫉妒吗，嫉妒会引发可怕的修罗场哦！

女儿的心理和生理健康——这个就值得吐槽了，打工有害身心也就算了，为什么学习也会有害身心啊，难道学习不能使女儿快乐吗？

偶尔会有突发事件——王国的刺客，值得挑战的敌人等等等。

[h1]综上所述：[/h1]

总体上来看，这是一部相当值得称赞的美少女养成游戏，个人非常推荐购买。

不过非常值得吐槽的是，明明正版是有汉化的，然而steam版本没有汉化，这真他妈的令人头大。


[spoiler]好在我日语勉强过关，很多对话也并不复杂，只要有高中文化水平（都是简单的选项和对话，有cgcv过场动画和图片提示而且日语里面的汉字也有很大的引导性）再加上一部有着拍照翻译功能的华为手机，就完全不需要担心语言问题影响游玩——话说我没有遇到bug，似乎日语版没什么问题的样子吧？[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198353873501', 'num_games_owned': 2524, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 536, 'last_played': 1590081619}
review:
[h1]一代经典集大成之作 - 好久不见[/h1]

[h1]前言与短评：[/h1]
大家好，是我十字字符哒，这次评论要感谢色情游戏的牵线鉴赏家活动。

这次跟大家分享的游戏叫Princess Maker 5，中文叫做美少女梦工厂5，下面简称PM5。

PM5是一款带有冒险内容的养成类游戏，游戏中将要扮演退休后到日本当上班族的原勇者，再次遇到交往多年的友人吉普，本次的女儿是来自人间界的公主候补，少女失去了父母与记忆，因此勇者又将再次与吉普一起，培养女儿成为新任的王国公主。

本次游戏带回了冒险系统，这次的冒险不能自由探索地图，而是采用数次战斗or开箱的探索模式，战斗数值及系统虽然并不复杂，但冒险中依然有多种不同事件，且冒险系统将与主线息息相关。

而本次的养成系统，加入了更多的系统，由于是在日本，本次的女儿要照常上课，但除此之外，有着影响性格的教育方针、平时的打工及进修，周日的自由行程，大地图上可以移动的地点就有30多个，而且还有更多的互动选项。

PM5也加强了个性系统，本次的女儿比过去有着更纤细且多变的内心，个性也将影响亲子互动、事件、结局等各方面。

本次的出场人物也多达30多人，光是好友就有16位(14+2)，而日本的节日、活动及事件也不少，本次的日常剧情也是十分丰富。

而本作有着优秀的立绘及CG，女儿有多种不同的年龄段、体态、体型的变化及多达20多种不同的服装，事件、活动、结局、旅游也有着多种CG，在进行课程(行程)及自宅中女儿也有多种不同的Q版动画，而且事件都有语音，CV有着30多位。

PM5的优点有丰富的出场人物与设定，复杂的养成与事件，交杂而庞大的剧情，优秀的立绘及CG。

游戏问题在于，架构过于庞大显得杂乱，游玩时间太长及节奏缓慢。
→另，尚无中文，名字不能自由输入。

[h1]整体来说[/h1]
PM5是一款带有冒险成分的养成游戏，养成、事件、个性、主线、可交流的人物、可移动的场景、可更换的服装各方面都较前几作丰富，因此游戏不管是可玩性、耐玩度、重玩性都很高，而剧情方面有着主线、日常与众好友的互动，剧情也较前几作来的庞大。不过架构也因此有些杂乱，游玩时间太长及节奏缓慢也是问题，如果喜好养成游戏的玩家建议尝试，但PM5在PM系列中不算是最出色的，建议先尝试PM2。

[h1]备注：[/h1]
注意，本评测没有剧透。
注意，评测游玩的版本是steam上的2018.6.4版及实体的繁中版交叉，版本的细节上可能有所差别。
*单轮约20hr。

游戏体验为个人观感，可能会存在个体差异。

[h1]整体性简评
游戏系统介绍 -
人物养成与日常：[/h1]
先来谈论一下女儿的养成，本作的地点在"日本"，女儿需要正常上学，而时间基本上是以"周"来进行。

上课时间比照当时(过去)的学校(3学期制度)，一周七天，下课后可以进行打工或额外学习，仅有一天休息。
→可以自己设定门禁时间。
→才艺班如过去，升级后会越来越贵。

每月要先设定"教育方针"，主要影响个性发展。

每周日则可以设定每周的课后安排，主要影响女儿素质，而日常课程则是固定的。

而每周日是自由时间，除非有事先安排的事件或活动，一整天都是自由时间。

本作也有生病、自闭、不良、视力不良、体重过重等各种负面状况。

而安排行程中，除了素质及个性，最重要的就是压力，由于平日的课程较密集，周末的安排就显得很重要。

而随着女儿长大，会遇见新的朋友、有新的打工、才艺班可以选择。

而每三个月会有一份艾蜜莉news，上面会标注各个活动与事件的时间。

而节日、生日、大型活动(烟火大会、新年参拜)等事件，也都会标注。

[h1]战斗与事件：[/h1]
女儿总有一天将面对过去，踏入其他世界修练并追寻真相。

在女儿稍微长大一点后，可以到各世界进行冒险修练。

本作的冒险系统非常简易，选择冒险地点后，女儿就会自动开始探索，会遇到数次敌人或捡到宝物，打完boss就会回家，当日来回。

战斗除了基本的攻击、魔法、道具、逃跑之外，其余技能也各有效果(言灵、音乐等)，但战斗系统方面的数值不多。

整个冒险系统并不复杂，但开启新世界的事件与平日事件相关，开启新世界需要依照一定顺序解主线，也就是听到风声、打败暗杀者，打败各地反叛的boss才能获得下个地区的道具。
→说来简单，但是冒险相关事件穿插在日常养成之中，而且每次冒险都只有3-5场战斗(一天)，游玩上很不连贯。

[h1]好友系统：[/h1]
女儿在平日相处的除了父(母)与小管家，就是她那些好友们。

本作的好友系统，平日同学校的好友们可以在上、下学间遇见，在下课后或周末的空闲时间，到各地点也会遇见。
→旧式GAL那种，时间及地点基本固定，但要自己找规律。

而女儿的好友们，在感情好之后，会提出一起出游的提议，也会在平日送小礼物，逢年过节也都会有活动邀约，到达挚友的程度时，也会有特别的礼物，而男性朋友也可以进阶为"男朋友"。

不过本作的好友系统，最麻烦的就是，"忌妒"。

女儿的好友们在逐渐下降好感后，会提出"绝交"，这时就会增加大量(50)压力。
→如果需要重新挽回这段友情，比从头开始还难，但依然是可以挽回的。
→没来往过没事，成为好友后不理就会狂降好感，好友一多，就会陷入忌妒地狱。

[b]整体来说[/b]
PM5不是一款容易上手的游戏，充裕的时间与几乎没有强制的事件让游戏的难易度称不上高，但过多的数值与容易发怒的好友们，金钱与压力的衡量都让游戏显得复杂。

是的，PM5要提升素质只要慢慢来就好，虽然以"周"来进行，但平日的好友对话、好友邀约、好友忌妒，还要注意压力、牙疼、视力状况、体重、个性发展，时间依然尚算充裕，全部处里好不难，但是在游玩上就显得过于繁琐与沉闷。

各系统也有不少同样状况，每年一直重复的事件与活动，说着一样的话的好友，需依照顺序却又缓慢的主线推进，冒险系统的也是如此。

游戏结局依然数量庞大，而且依照个性及素质有所不同，游戏结局依然会有不同。

游戏的系统可玩性很大，由于性格影响大因此重玩性质也极高，架构也极为庞大，耐玩性也高。
→只可惜游戏的架构较松散导致游戏游玩体验普通，而过于庞大的内容可能也会让新玩家陷入困惑。

[h1]内容表现：
故事背景[/h1]
勇者退休后回到日本成为一个普通上班族，突然有一天交往多年的友人吉普来访，吉普带来了一位少女，那是一位来自人间界的公主候补，人间界突然遭受了反抗军的突袭，少女失去了父母与记忆，因此勇者又将再次与吉普一起，培养女儿成为新任的王国公主。
→别问为什么是交往多年的友人，铁打的吉普，流水的女儿。
→别问每一代不是都不同时空背景吗，是我、是我、都是我。

[h1]剧情与结构[/h1]
游戏的主体就是日常中与女儿的互动，与前几作类似，游戏主要的事件变化在于依照女儿的年纪及个性，因此在女儿的个性大体成形后，整整八年时间，除了不同邀约外与年龄段影响外，许多事件的内容都是一样的。
→女儿性格提供多轮游戏乐趣，但同一轮之中，重复事件还是略多。

而本作的主线剧情比前几作来的庞大，但这主要是因为出场人物够多，女儿在日本有着众多朋友们，人物事件交替发生才显得内容丰富，实际上每个人物的剧情的确不少，但相比"整整八年"的时间，人物剧情还是太少。
→日常够丰​​富，每个人物的剧情也都各有特色，但游戏时间太长。

而主线有着五界暗杀者(四个)及五界boss(六个)，剧情穿插在日常与冒险中，剧情算是安排得很不错，但主线的剧情问题在于时间拉得太长。
→主线很有趣，但时间安排上间隔太久。

[b]整体来说[/b]
如同过去几作，女儿会随着你的安排逐渐成长，拥有各种不同性格，而且比前几作来说，性格上的设定更为纤细，往往需要进行细微调整。
→在日常中，除了需要身体与心理健康，也需要常常关注视力及牙齿健康。
→个性发展上，女儿的个性也更加丰富。

而在养成系统上，除了身体与心理健康，依然是要平衡开支与成长，虽然如同上面谈过的，本次的时间相较充裕，虽然同样是八年，但本次的时间安排上以"周"为单位，课程以"hr"来进行，本作在培养上比较没有急迫性。
→周日的自由行动时间也是很充裕的。

本作的场景在日本，那结局自然就有一般现代职业，而既然开放了冒险，那女儿也可能选择奇幻式的职业，五界女王、公主、结婚，女儿将踏上的未来可说是最丰富的一代。

本作在各方面可以说是集大成的一代，丰富的出场人物与设定，复杂的养成与事件，交杂而庞大的剧情，PM5可以说是塞入了过去所有的内容。
→不过也因此在结构上显得有点杂乱。
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1772691676
[h1]画面及音乐[/h1]
本作有丰富的立绘及CG，光是女儿的服装就多达20多套，除了年龄段的变化也有着多种体态及体型的差异，事件、活动、结局、旅游也有着各种CG。
→CG及立绘的丰富程度依然保持过往水准。

而女儿在自家中及进行课程(行程表)时也全部都有动画，虽然Q版动图没有太多年龄、体态变化，但本作行程数量不少，而且自宅也会随着女儿的个性、添购家具与事件发展改变。

而且本作虽然不是全语音，但事件都是有语音的，本次出场人物众多，CV多达30-40多位，内容十分丰富。
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1772691641
[h1]价格与CP值：[/h1]
原价90腿，史低特价76腿。

PM系列都是老作品了，价格方面以情怀来说，绝对值得购入。

不过对于未玩过的新玩家来说，这款游戏的风格及玩法可能有点旧了，而且对于新玩家来说PM5的游玩时间太长、节奏太缓慢，而且事件互相穿插，复杂而难以上手。

整体来说，游戏是好游戏，但新玩家如果对PM系列有兴趣，推荐从PM2开始尝试。

[h1]其他：[/h1]
成就部分
共70个成就，分别为成长、课程(行程表)、主线、结局。

成长、课程、主线相关成就很简单，但结局针对性的刷不难，但单轮用时过长，全成就遥遥无期。

BUG部分
无明显恶性bug。

[h1]结论、心得与杂谈：[/h1]
好久不见。

已经很久没打开PM5了，如果没有这次评测的机会，可能依然不会重新游玩这款PM5。

曾经，我看着你长大，然后离开。

如今，与你重逢，再次送你离开。

每次的相遇与别离，都令人百感交集。

还记得当年第一次玩pm2，没记错的话是宫廷法师结局，然后是占卜、勇者、魔王，还有许多其他职业。

然后是PM1、3、4、5，偏外传性质的Q、GO！ GO！ 、魔法石，甚至不知道是不是同公司的美少女梦工厂OL(网页)。

PM系列至如今仅是留在记忆中回味的过去，不知道还有多少老玩家记得，也不知道有多少新玩家听说，但PM系列绝对是值得游玩的一款优良作品，虽然PM5在其中不能算是最出色的，但还是推荐给各位玩家。
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1772692354

author: {'steamid': '76561198262512786', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1865, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1606213411}
review:
The translation is very sloppy. It's mostly understandable, but some lines are translated in such a way they end up saying the opposite of what they should mean (and that's to say nothing of all the lines that are straight up missing in events- all those blank boxes...). The game could also use some streamlining, navigating the map is a hassle with the way the time system works. The game itself would be very charming otherwise, but the issues definitely hamper the experience.

Also it's super long...I'm only on year 2 and it feels like I've played it for ages

author: {'steamid': '76561198361086396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1669654160}
review:
실행이 안됩니다. 윈도우 10 쓰고 있고 윈도우 디펜더에서 해당폴더를 위협방지에서 제외시키고 재설치해도 안되고
스팀에서 제시한 방법으로 링크를 타고 들어가서 윈도우 디펜더 관련 파일을 설치하고 또 지우고 재설치하고
두 시간 가까이 지웠다 깔았다 하면서 시도해봤는데 안됩니다.
플레이를 누르면 시작준비중이라는 창만 떴다가 꺼졌다가 반복됩니다.
오랜만에 추억의 게임 해 볼 생각에 부풀었다가 지금은 지쳐서
더이상 게임을 하고 싶은 마음이 없는데 환불 신청은 또 어디서 해야하는지 모르겠네요.
또 실행 안될까봐 불안해서 앞으로 다른 스팀게임들도 구매하기 꺼려질 것 같습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198845092837', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 18160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11357, 'last_played': 1693583435}
review: 아직 별로 안해봤는데 시간이 오래걸리는게 단점이긴해요. 친구들 관리하느라 주말에 돌아댕겨서 그런것도 있고 일주일 단위로 넘어가기도 하니까요, 근데 무사수행은 오히려 프메2보다 편하게 만들어놔서 좋구요, 엄마로 선택할수있다는게 너무 좋아요, 프메2를 사랑했던 사람으로써 프메2와는 다른 엔딩 에피소드 같은거 보는 재미로 가끔씩 하고있습니다. 그냥 뭐 하루에 3달씩만 가볍게 키우는게 멘탈유지나 체력유지에 도움될 것같아요. 아 맞다 동아리 고를수있는거 재밌어서 좋아요 대회나가는 것도 좋구 부모 월급 한달마다 꼬박꼬박 들어와서 좋구 왕자가 별루 안 잘생긴건 흠입니다. 프메2 왕자 보고싶다 잘생겼는데, 글구 솔직히 말해서 진프린세스 엔딩 만들기 쉬울것같아요 일단 그냥 프린세스는 만들었는데 별로 안어려웠거든요 제가 너무 고인물이라 그런건지 몰라도 일단 엔딩 내기는 쉬워용 근데 단점 한개더 결혼엔딩하고 직업엔딩 따로따로 나오는일이 별로없네요 프로포즈 받으면 걍 결혼해서 주부직행; 그래서 남자친구들이랑 잘 안놀기 시작했습니다, 주부 그만 어음 정리하자면 시간 많으시고 프메2 좋아하셨던 분들에게 추천드립니다 재밌는 예능하나 틀어놓고 하면 좋아요 전 런닝맨 보면서 합니다 챠오

author: {'steamid': '76561198850988242', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1426, 'last_played': 1654154603}
review:
When it was mentioned on other websites that the average playtime is 30 hours, I can assure you it is no joke. I have played for a full day non-stop and I barely transitioned from year 11 to just celebrating the 14th birthday. And I was already using the Ctrl function to forward everything. The replay value for this game will be immense, if one does not first die from the utter, pure mind strain that is micromanaging your daughter's life. I now hold a whole new level of respect out there for parents, especially the tiger moms made famous in the US, even if I disagree with their ways of parenting. 

Either way, playing this game truly does make one invested in it, because hell, it is already about 30 hours and I am not even halfway through. I played it offline and online so yeah, trust me when I say that I have already played for more than 30 hours. Trust me when I say that a guide is absolutely necessary. You won't even feel that you're cheating with how much shit you need to calculate and think about just for your daughter to not end up overstressed or bankrupt. The worst part of it all?

Spoilers:



Apparently if the daughter marries she cannot get a job. Like, why the fuck would i spend hours and hours of my life and time (in real life) to just get an ending that says(she got married and depending on stats, divorced) without noting her career? For that reason I am putting this game on hold, even though I dearly would have loved to finish my first playthrough to just see if I am a shitty parent (technically with the child labour I already am but oh well) and how my daughter would have turned up. It is just too demanding for my current schedule and I sacrificed too much already just to get to this point. 

Mark my words, I'll be back. If only to finish my first playthrough and end it all. I may be a partial completionist, but hell no am I promising myself such torture(especially if I somehow end up getting the same ending again, I'll go insane).

But for now, I'll leave this game to the others who have the time to truly savour the complexity of this game and the resilience to accept the fate this game declares for them at the end of their 30 or more so hours. God help those poor souls who have a specific target ending in mind.

review: 버그가 많다는 후기가 많아서 할까말까 고민하다가 딸도 여태 시리즈 중에서 제일 맘에 드는 그림체라서 눈 딱 감고 구매해서 플레이 했는데 아직까지 일어난 버그는 이름을 이상하게 지으면 딸아이 성적발표, 보너스 급여 받을 때 요괴문자 나오는 정도랄까요..? :) 다른 건 다 정상적으로 플레이 되고 있습니다. 플레이시간도 다른 프린세스 메이커보다 많이 긴 편이긴 하지만 그만큼 더 정감이 가는 게임이네요. 전작들은 빨리 엔딩씬 모으려고 휘리릭 넘기느라 즐긴다는 느낌을 못 받은 것 같아요. 퇴근하고 돌아와서 요것만 하다가 새벽 4시를 뚫지만.. 그만큼 친구이벤트나 모험이나 스토리가 사람을 빠져들게 만드는 것 같아요. 딸도 이뻐요.. 만날 수 있는 캐릭터도 많으니 스토킹하는 재미가 쏠쏠합니다(?) 엔딩 하나 보려면 3~4일 걸립니다. 할 게임이 워낙 없던 사람으로서는 굉장히 반갑습니다. 유명한 성우 목소리를 들을 수 있어서 반갑네요. 우리 딸 !! 사랑해 !!

author: {'steamid': '76561198043000626', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1580753731}
review:
На мой субъективный взгляд, PM5 - лучший симулятор воспитания (и именно воспитания) из всей линейки. Всё-таки в остальных частях серии мы растим ребёнка в суровом фэнтезийном мире, где десятилетняя девочка вынуждена зарабатывать себе на жизнь пока её папаша сидит на диване, принимает какие-то решения да ждёт ежегодное социальное пособие для героев в отставке (причём сумма пособия такая, что та же девочка может заработать едва ли не больше за две недели). А здесь - современный Токио. Вы - хоть и герой (или героиня, почему бы и нет?) в отставке, но имеете работу, с зарплатой достаточной, чтобы не отправлять маленького ребёнка батрачить сутки напролёт. Да и девочка уже в обязательном порядке ходит в школу, а оплачиваются лишь факультативные занятия. По воскресеньям вы можете гулять с дочкой по городу, а можете предоставить её самой себе. И каждое решение имеет свои последствия, влияя на интересы, поведение и общее состояние девочки! А ведь вы теперь планируете не просто на месяц или неделю вперёд, но назначаете чем дочка будет заниматься каждый день. Влияет даже то как часто и о чем вы с ней разговариваете! И...в итоге к этому забавному спрайтику привыкаешь, привязываешься и действительно начинаешь задумываться: "А чего это у меня до сих пор нет детей?" (Ну или "О Боже, какой кошмар, нет-нет-нет, мне ещё таких проблем в жизни не хватало!", но...)
В общем-то игра настолько детально (хотя на данный момент не могу сказать насколько близко к реальности) описывает процесс воспитания, что её можно даже использовать в качестве проективного теста для выявления отношения к детям, проблем в воспитании или даже в отношении к себе - смотря какую цель вы поставите. Но о чем это я? Ах, да! 
Ещё хочется отметить озвучку: как по мне, в японских играх она всегда на высоте, и PM5 - не исключение. Все персонажи прекрасно озвучены, музыка приятная, а уж тему из опенинга я не могу выкинуть из головы лет эдак 5-6. 
Главная же проблема игры, как по мне, вытекает из неё достоинств, а именно - невероятно затянутый игровой процесс. Помните, это все тот же Princess Maker, и в игре все так же остаётся куча разнообразных концовок, на которые, конечно же, хочется посмотреть. Но...в общем, если вы, как я, не любите пользоваться гайдами и вам тоже нравится не переигрывать старый сейв по-новому, а растить девочку заново для каждой новой задумки, то у меня для вас плохие новости. Все-таки игровой процесс остаётся монотонным и однообразным, на отыгрыш одного года уходит от трёх до пяти часов, а отыграть надо десять лет. Вот и считайте. И это только одна концовка. Причём почему-то свадебные концовки идут отдельно и не сочетаются с "рабочими". Вот так. Либо сильная независимая женщина, либо замужем.))
Ещё мне не очень понравилась реализация режима приключений, которая появляется после определённых событий в игре: поначалу эти передвижения в 2д смотрятся даже стильно, но потом от них хочется взвыть. Да и "секретики", как во второй части, отсутствуют: ни посиделок с демонами, ни чаепития с феями! Эх! 
И все-таки, несмотря на все недостатки, игра стоящая, она затягивает, эмоционально вовлекает, и, если вы любите симуляторы воспитания, то попробовать поиграть непременно стоит. Хотя бы чтобы проверить: а какой родитель получится из вас?;)

...Это про саму игру. Я просто не могла поставить PM5 плохую оценку в Стим - я действительно очень благодарна за возможность поиграть в любимую игру без танцев с бубном с эмулятором и/или японской локалью, но... Я должна быть с вами честна: этот порт - так себе, да и перевод совсем без души, явно отредактированный (хочется верить) машинный. Как человеку, некогда потратившему множество часов своей бесценной жизни на чудом запущенную "демоверсию" с фанатским частичным переводом, играть в эту версию мне несколько больно. Но...все-таки возможно. Никаких откровенных вылетов или ненажимающихся кнопок в городе, как жаловался кто-то из англоязычных товарищей, у меня не было. Думаю, мне большей частью неуютно именно из-за перевода, но это не первая и не последняя азиатская игра со скверным переводом, так что, друзья, либо героически учим восточные языки, либо не менее героически терпим.

Итого: самой игре жирная 5+. Бесспорно, этот симулятор воспитания уникален в своём роде, не выглядит устаревшим благодаря рисованной графике, и, на десерт, отличается пусть незатейливой, но заставляющей попереживать за дочку, сюжетной линией. Так что - рекомендую, но - готовьтесь к тому, что эта версия далека от идеала. И, тем не менее, спасибо и за неё.

author: {'steamid': '76561198883415987', 'num_games_owned': 615, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 9567, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5929, 'last_played': 1561556933}

author: {'steamid': '76561198137276862', 'num_games_owned': 181, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 5363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2876, 'last_played': 1689136614}
review: I love Princess Maker games. After playing this for a whole lot of hours i do honestly enjoy it. but i still love Princess Maker 2 better. But this game is very slow! even if you fast foward through stuff every little thing is going to be time consuming. but i do enjoy it but i wish they found a way to make it faster. I sunk 30 hours into this game and i am still in year one. I can't believe it. i have 8 more years to go in this game.  The animations take too long. theres a bunch of animations for every day she goes to school, and then they're the events she has everytime she wants to hang out with her classmates. i love how you can choose different professions and you have more money so you don't have to work her to death. It's hard to get rid of stress in this game. you have to buy a lot of items to lower it. and she doesn't seem to care about lowering it herself even when she has time to herself. stress management is more annoying in this game then in others. also are the tests she passes random? theres no rhyme or reason to her performance in school even though her stats in that area are good. I like seeing the stats that are being raised, but they are raised by fractions. Having a few shops and locations is great but theres too many places to go and theres too many submenus. i have to "scope" out the map and go into the submenus to see where a specific event or sale is taking place. just get rid of the submenus so i don't have to click so much. maybe have a hover feature that when you hover over an area the sub menus pop up. also this game encourages you to buy a bunch of stat raising items as they're multiple shops. but you have to individually click each dang time. just put in a little box where i can type in the number of things i want so i can buy in bulk. geez. i heard they bought back adventuring which sounds great. but i havent gotten that far yet.  this isnt a good game for replay value even though it has multiple endings because as i said i am still in year one. my god man. did they not test this game out? sorry i made a review before i finished the game but i thought i would die of old age before i could write about it. i still love it and it's enjoyable. each day i figure out out what to do with her time and thats fun. but this is a long game. Princess Maker 2 i could finish in a day. i did over 30 hours in this game an im nowhere near done.

author: {'steamid': '76561198801768142', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 604, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1712507723}
review:
3일전 구매해서 첫날 둘째날 잘 플레이 됐는데 갑자기 셋째날인 오늘부터 실행이 안됩니다.
지워서 재설치를 해봐도, windows difender에 프메5를 허용해도 안되네요...
처음에 오카에리~ 이런 음성이 나오는 Yonago Gaunax 화면이 뜨고 
그 다음 CFK로고가 뜨는 화면이 기존창화면보다 작게 뜨더니 검은화면으로 변하면서 꺼집니다.
정상실행 됐던 어제까지는 CFK로고 화면이 기존창크기에 맞게 떴는데 갑자기 오늘부터 작게 뜨더니 프로그램이 꺼지네요
스팀에 환불을 요구하니 3.7시간 했다고 안된다고 합니다 ㅠㅜ
그 외에 어디 문의할 곳도 없고 평가작성란에 문의해봅니다. 어떻게 해결해야하나요?

해결완료, 어떤 분이 고맙게도 해결법을 알려주셨습니다. 호환성문제해결을 눌러 권장방법으로 실행하니 게임이 잘 실행됩니다. 판매자가 아니라 유저가 직접 해결법을 찾아야한다니 좀 어이없고 열받지만 그래도 잘 해결되어 즐겁게 플레이중입니다. 해결해주신 분 정말 천사!

author: {'steamid': '76561198153489538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1801, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 753, 'last_played': 1684815364}

author: {'steamid': '76561198119743582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 4332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1040, 'last_played': 1560320217}
review:
장점:
1.프메임
2.딸이 커여움.겁나 커여움
3.현실세계에서 육성한다는 참신함
4.섬팅 인비지블. 뭔가...뭔가 재미있음

단점.
1.유명하기 그지없는 플레이타임, 더이상 자세한 설명은 생략한다.
2.한번 플레이 후 사소한 조작으로 여러 엔딩 보기가 거의 불가능함
  2.1 '친구'들의 참피스러운 마음가짐.
               2주 못보면 소울프랜드라고 자칭했던 놈들이 떨어저나감. 진짜 친구라고 부를수 있는 캐릭터는 작중 2명밖에 없다 ㅅㅂ
  2.2 소울프랜드 달성하면 최소한 기간을 무진장 늘려줘라. 아님 FM마냥 공식 에디터라도 줘 제발.
3.1+2 의 부모출타 디시너지. 제정신임?
4.판타지+현실 이라는 컨셉은 좋은데 둘이 전혀 상호작용을 하지 않는 스토리 및 게임 디자인
  2.1의 순식간에 깨어져 나가는 꽃다운 우정 때문에 모험 나가면 안그래도 빡센 호감도 관리가 거의 뭐 불가능해짐.
  판타지세계에서 넘어온 컨셉은 좋은데 그럼 두세계가 서로 영향을 주고 받든가 해야지...끽해야 단방향 약간 나오는게 고작임.
 현실세계에서 구축한 인간관계가 주인공의 고난 극복에 영향을 안줌.
아니 프메4 보고 뭐 배운게 없나? 프메4 싫어서 절대 용납못해서 이렇게 좋은 소재감을 못살리는거임? 올클리어 하면 뭔가 보상이 있어야지 올클리어도 거의 불가능하게 해놓고 보상도 없고. 걍 올클리어하지 말라는건데 그 마인드가 의심스러움
5.사윗감으로 삼을 놈이 없다. 죄다 인성 나감. 큐브나 하다못해 애비가 데리고 가는게 건전하고 행복할줄은 상상도 못했다 ㅅㅂ;;
   ㅎㅌㅊ 사윗감이면 좀 복선이라도 깔아놓든가. 깜빡이도 안키고는 인성 들어내는거 실화임?


야리코미하는 놈들에게 적합한 컨텐츠 분량과 불친절함을 던져주고는 올클리어 보상은 없는 게임 레벨링 디자인 구조를 보면 이거 기획자 머리는 대체 무슨 빡대가린지 심히 의심스러움
제 점수는 우리아이가 머리는 좋은데 공부를 안해서 드리겠습니다.
그래도 딸내미는 커여우니 긍정주겠다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198195925714', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 3268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2804, 'last_played': 1683009584}
review:
I finally finished this game. I wanted to write my review earlier but after beating the game for the first time with 44hours invested into it I can really speak my thoughts. This game has a lot of mixed reviews and I can see why but I went into this game with lower expectations but was extremely surpirsed. 

I didn't expect myself to adore this game as much as I do. They bring back the friendship mechanic from PM3 but it's executed much better.

This game isn't going to be for everyone but it's worth the money. Unlike the first two games where you plan a  months of activity or the third where you can constantly change up the work flow, you plan each day. Which is probably why the game takes so long. I was 23 hours into the game on my fourth year and learned through the Wiki I could fast forward using CTRL. Though it made tedious things easy reading the dialog is such a joy. 

Being there for the daughter every day instead of week is much more intimate. I found myself caring for her and worring about her thinking about how bad of a mom would I be if I let her get hurt. This game allows you to finally choose the gender of your character which was nice since I could finally have my daughter call me mom instead of dad.

Normally a game so long would put people off but I believe it's the strongest part of the game. Having a long game allows for more intimate moments. My first playthrough though I didn't get the princess ending as those are difficult I got one that I was pleased with. The friendship mechanic is much more fleshed out and its better than your daughter marrying a random man after she becomes an adult.

The only real problem is the amount of things you need to keep track of. Other than that though, this is probably my favourite Princess Maker game. I do reccomend it to even people who are feeling a bit unsure. 

(also the 'broken' english that people complain about isn't that broken you just need to think about that's being said people just over-react.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198170869129', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 320, 'playtime_forever': 2216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 534, 'last_played': 1561579327}
review:
This game is like some kind of anime version of Japanese daily life of a well-off family. It's very long so it's worth the money as there is a lot of stuff to do and things to go after. 
After more than 8 hours, she's only 11 for me. 
PROS
Long, probably as long as real life because you watch every day go by for 8 years. 
Nice graphics, sound, voice acting, writing, story
CONS
She gets extremely stressed quickly
Gets boring
Translations are odd 
The girl character isn't as cute as the previous ones
The cultural aspects are annoying because repetitive and strange hybrids of celebrations
Having her be a secretary as a standard career is offensive and not a good career for her.
Whitening foundation - offensive to everyone for many reasons - "you wanna be white?" - yikes

SPOILER
Daughter might have a  thing for foster father if he's too nice - hope she knows he's not her dad at least

author: {'steamid': '76561198080609853', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 1018, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1018, 'last_played': 1538137229}

author: {'steamid': '76561198843071049', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 390, 'last_played': 1689512717}
review:
어렸을 때 cd를 사서 플레이하다가 cd도 잃어버리고 해서 다시 스팀으로 구매했어요
어릴 때 추억이 생각이 나는데 음..솔직히 오래된 게임 치고 가격이 좀ㅎㅎ 
스팀판과 cd 판의 차이라고 하면 음.. cd에서는 '안 되'라고 오타가 계속 있어서 거슬렸는데 스팀판에서는 제대로 고쳐져 있었고
그 외에 선택지에서 있었던 텍스트 밀림 현상이 고쳐져 있네요. 그리고 cd판에서 계속 오류났었던 그 켄이치랑 친해졌을 때 나오는 고양이 이벤트도 무리 없이 플레이 했네요. 도전과제도 있어서 좋구요. 근데 솔직히 그 외에는 잘 모르겠어요ㅎㅎ 그래도 컴퓨터 사양이 변하면서 이제는 플레이 불가능할 거라 생각했던 게임을 한다는 점에서 상당히 만족스럽네요.  예전부터 다시 플레이하고 싶어서 여기저기 알아보다 포기했는데 스팀에 있어서 정말 기뻤어요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198344157123', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1536472308}
review:
I was so excited to play this game, but it is so difficult to navigate and buggy

1. It refuses to go to full screen mode. 
2. The controls are less streamlined than PM2
3. There aren't that many keyboard shortcuts you can use
4. The "town" menu is too extensive and complicated to navigate
5. I can see why this is less popular than PM2
6. There doesn't seem to be automatic save? You have to manually save each time. 

I wish I could have my money back. :/

author: {'steamid': '76561198184659501', 'num_games_owned': 1102, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 2721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1607, 'last_played': 1693726879}
review:
2회차 플레이를 하려면 최소 5년쯤 지나야 그럴 마음이 들 것 같다는 건 정말... 엄청난 문제지만 그래도 나는 이 게임을 좋아한다. 비록 하다가 질려서 엔딩도 보지 않았지만 좋아한다. 전체 플레이타임이 지금의 3할만 줄었어도 평가도 좋고 내가 엔딩도 못 보고 게임을 끌 일도 없었을 것 같긴 하다. 
한 달을 10일 정도로 나눠서 세 개의 스케줄을 넣는 것과 일주일을 시간 단위로 넣는 것의 그 차이가... 겪어보면 상상 이상이기 때문에 정말 견뎌낼 자신이 있는 사람만 사는 게 좋을 것 같음. 그래서 이 게임이 그래도 좋은 이유가 뭔데? 라고 묻는다면 나도 잘 모르겠다... 그냥 나한테는 이런 방식이 잘 맞는 것 같고... 프메 1 2 3 5 중에 제일 재미있게 했음. 2와 3과 5의 장점을 잘 합쳐서 게임을 낼 수는 없었나... 엔딩 좀 보게 해줘

author: {'steamid': '76561198050079563', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 3627, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3627, 'last_played': 1535074054}
review:
Don't get me wrong, the game itself is excellent; REALLY long, but fun. The problem is that the translation is sometimes weird and difficult to understand (as if it had been partially made by using automatic translation software or by a non-native English speaker), which might me a problem for newcomers. If you are familiar with the series, this game is fine for you.

EDIT: I finally finished the game for the 1st time and, avoiding spoilers, the endings suck (at least marriage ones). They aren't nearly as interesting as in PM2; (MINOR SPOILER) your princess can't marry and have a job at the same time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198203920911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2946, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2906, 'last_played': 1539386673}
review:
I played Princess Maker 2 before and felt it was quite easy to get the ending I wanted in a short span of 2 hours. Princess Maker 5 on the other hand is more intensive and if you didn't like how distant you felt from your daughter, don't worry: PM5 had your back. I married Hitoshi however and got a major translation error - It said I married Ryunosuke, a guy I wasn't even pursuing when I clearly got Hitoshi's ending. (other translation errors included Cube saying his breasts were lacking when testing the functionality of the Sexy Clothes) I felt bad that I paid $26 for a translation that was this buggy. (It was only worth it because Hitoshi's route was so chuckle worthy, I wish I recorded it.)

Long story short: Wouldn't recommend it if you don't like bad translations and REALLY long playthroughs. Would recommend if this is your cup of tea however.

author: {'steamid': '76561198185756639', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1254, 'last_played': 1531512533}
review:
I really like this game but it's certainly not for everybody. I currently have 20 hours and first daughter hasn't turned 18 yet. Compared to PM2 where within 12 hours I've had about 4 daughters grow up, that's............. kinda ridiculous.

The translation is pretty bad but I can roll with it, the new stuff like managing friends and a more modern setting make up for the cons for me. 

This game is really in depth however, I'd use the fanmade wiki for PM5 just to limit the "HUH?" moments.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012183459', 'num_games_owned': 82, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 872, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1596432493}
review: 프메5는 원래 초보들이 접하기 힘든건데 에디터까지 막으니 처음부터 고생길 훤한 사람들은 이게임 비추천함

author: {'steamid': '76561198843296406', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 387, 'last_played': 1564285861}
review:
저는 프린세스 메이커 시리즈를 예전부터 좋아해오던 사람입니다. 입문은 프린세스 메이커4로 했었지만, 과거에 프린세스메이커5를 플레이한 적이 있었죠.스팀판이 출시되었다고 해서 이렇게 구매를 하게 되었습니다.
프메5는 난이도가 낮은 프린세스메이커4에 비해 난이도가 극악수준입니다.
무엇보다 스팀판으로 재출시되면서 물가도 비싸졌습니다. 쓸데없이 현실적이네욯ㅎㅎㅎㅎ
플레이타임도 겁나게 깁니다.기존의 프메1, 프메2, 프메3, 프메4, 심지어는 프메for kakao 까지.... 어느 시리즈들과 견주어도 한달이 지나가는 시간은 매우 길 겁니다.
그렇지만 그게 무조건 단점은 아닙니다.
다양한 이벤트도 있고, 딸의 감정 하나하나를 더 관찰할 수 있게 되었다는 점이죠.
그리고 어머니와 아버지를 고를 수 있다는 점과 현대를 배경으로 한다는 게 이 프메5의 가장 큰 장점인 것 같습니다.
하지만 제가 위에서 이야기했다시피 극악의 난이도를 자랑합니다.
바로 스트레스 때문이죠.
이 스트레스 때문에 많은 유저들이 치트를 사용합니다.
능력치는 3~5 씩 오르는데 스트레스는 7씩 오르기 때문이죠..ㅎㅎ...
하지만 플레이하시다보면 재미있을 것입니다.
그러나 입문용으로는 추천하지 않습니다.
프메 시리즈 다 해봤지만 제일 쉬운건 프메4. 고로 입문용으로는 프메4를 추천합니다.
무사수행도 없고 남자들도 공략하기 쉽습니다. 
나는 좀 실력이 된다 다양한 거 해보고 싶다 프메5. 아니면 프메2,3도 괜찮아요. 
프린세스메이커의 추억을 맛보고 싶으신 분들, 육성시뮬 처음 입문하시는 분들 구매하셔도 돈아깝지 않아요 후회안합니다!
다만 플레이타임이 긴 게임을 싫어하시는 분들은 질리실 수도 있겠네요.
(+웹서핑을 하다가 누가 프메5의 딸 얼굴이 다른 시리즈에 비해 별로다라는 말도 있지만 저는 상당히 귀엽다고 생각합니다!)

review: 예상하였던 것과 너무나도 다르네요. 화면의 크기는 아예 조종조차 안되고 (전체화면이 있었을까요? 저는 못봤습니다.) 게임자체도 너무 루즈했으며, 시대의 변화에 맞춰서 배경이 변했다기에는 ... UI가 정말 최악이었습니다. 이건 게임창 크기의 문제도 있었던 것 같지만, 여태까지의 UI를 생각했을 때 ... 오히려 더 나빠지지 않았는가 하는 인상만 남아있습니다. 개인적인 의견이에요. 1시간 40분 남짓밖에 하지 못했던 가장 큰 이유는, 이제 게임이 켜지지 않기 때문입니다. 사실 1시간 40분도 많이 했다고 생각합니다. 재미없어요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084739635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 2716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2206, 'last_played': 1528607287}
review:
If you've played previous Princess Makers and want more, this game is worth a shot. If you've never played one before, this isn't the best entry to start with. 

The main problem compared to, say, PM2 is that this game is l o n g. I've played over 36 hours and haven't even finished one playthrough yet. This may not sound so bad in a vaccuum, but one of the biggest points of these games is raising your daughter different ways and trying to get as many endings as you can. An overly long playthrough cycle is detrimental to that.

I could forgive it if that extra time was filled with fun stuff, but...it's not. Most of it comes from boring, repetitive tasks - dragging your daughter around on Sundays to reduce her stress(free time stress reduction has been nerfed so much that this is necessary) & maintain relationships with her friends, training/job schedules done every week instead of every month, having to personally approve each time she walks home with a friend, etc. Repetition is the bread and butter of Princess Maker games, but it's usually quick and requires minimal micromanagement. Not so in PM5.

The friendship system helps a little, giving you character events to break up the monotony, but it's riddled with its own problems. Everyone acts bizarrely jealous of each other at low friendship levels, frequently interrupting the school week to question your daughter about whoever she's closest to at the moment. The need to maintain friendships never stops, which is realistic but less than fun from the player's POV(why can't your daughter automatically hang out with them during the week?). If a friendship ever drops far enough that it devolves into a broken state, your daughter will bug you about it every Sunday until you fix it. As tempting as it is to befriend everyone, the saner option seems to be picking one or two friends and ignoring everyone else, since those downsides don't kick in until you're at a certain friendship level.

It's not all bad, though. Venturing has been dramatically improved - instead of taking the same routes through the same maps every time, your daughter progresses and fights things/finds items automatically. The random events & character events are generally pretty fun, and add some flavor to the game. Your daughter alternates between sweet and hilarious(with a brief bratty phase when she hits puberty), and feels much more like an actual character than the daughters of past games have. You also have a lot more flexibility than past games, and have it much earlier on - the usual cycles of stat building are still there, but depending on the job you pick, money can be pretty much a non-issue. The art is great, and the class/job/training animations are cuter than ever.

Overall I enjoyed PM5, but it definitely wears out its welcome a bit.


As for the stuff most of the other reviews have been complaining about: 
As much as others have been harping on the translation, it's not as big of a deal as they're making it out to be. It's definitely shoddy and amateurish, but there's never been a point where the translation left me confused about what's going on...except in your daughter's diary, where her personality summary is basically unintelligible. But there's a fortune teller where you can get exact personality values, so I'm willing to look past that.

I've encountered an entire one bug during my time playing it, and it's been fixed(crash at the potato festival). Game's pretty stable, honestly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198218177613', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 513, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 513, 'last_played': 1528274949}
review:
플레이타임이 정말 기네요.

저는 이런거 진짜 좋아하지만, 예상보다 너무 오래걸리는게 좀 버겁습니다ㅠㅠ

이벤트가 많아서 처음 플레이는 굉장히 즐겁게 할 수 있지만, 긴 플레이타임으로 인해서 두 번째는 쉽게 손이 안 갈 것 같아요.

엔딩을 모으는 재미가 있는 장르인데... 주말 이틀을 꼬박 써도 엔딩은커녕 2~3년 키우는게 전부라 빡셉니다ㅠㅠ

그래도 프린세스메이커 시리즈가 계속 스팀 이식 되는게 너무 기쁘네요.

사이드 시리즈?인  gogo princess도 스팀이식 되었으면 정말 좋겠습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018308137', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 655, 'last_played': 1547958439}
review:
추억팔이 하기에는 정말 좋은 게임이다. 
어린시절 프메2 부터 4까지 해서 여자지만 아빠로서 딸을 하루하루 키워나갔을 때 성장한 모습을 보고 
정말 폐인 처럼 밤샜던 날들을 기억한다.
그 중에 프메5가 정말 최고다. 
플레이 시간은 거의 밤새다시피 신중히 플레이하면 겨우 첫번째 엔딩을 본다. 
하지만 정말 해야할 요소들도 많고 꼬셔야하는 남자들과 친구 이벤트들도 많아서
다중 세이브를 하더라도 어디가 어디까지였는지 까먹어서 결국에는 다시 처음부터 한적이 많다.
재미있지만 지루한 것은 어쩔 수 없다. 
계속 반복적인 스케줄에다가 이벤트가 많다면 많다고 할 수 있겠지만 플레이 시간에 비하면 그 지루함을 다 충족 시켜주지 못하는 것은 어쩔 수 없는 것 같다. 
하지만 나처럼 프메를 위해 몰컴을 물빨듯이 했었던 사람이라면 윈도 10에서 프메5를  할 수 있는 것만으로도 정말 감사하다. 
아직 엔딩을 보지도 못했지만 이젠 직장인이니 가끔은 집순이가 되고 싶을때 시간 보내기 딱 좋은것 같다.
솔직히 다들 플레이시간 길다고 하는데 알고 하는 거잖아요? ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ

author: {'steamid': '76561198020170064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 6236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3483, 'last_played': 1657591250}
review:
I hate doing this because I really love this game, but this is a bad localization yet again that I cannot recommend it, until the translation is polished (Which it probably won't be) and the bugs fixed.  I mean, if you're not going to put any energy into localizing the game (Translating a game is more than just translating the japanese text into a language, it's about putting that and making it understandable to your language's audience), give it to someone who will.

First the good:  The game itself is charming and really fun, though if you played any of the other games, this is pretty easy to get the 'ultimate ending' in of the 4 I played so far.  This is also a long game, this isn't like PM2 where you can just plop down, play 5-8 hours, get an ending and go off again.  First end took me about 30 odd hours, mostly because the game is weekly instead of monthly like the others.

The game takes place in modern day Japan rather than a medieval setting, though your daughter is from a medieval world.  It's a very dark setting (This is explained in the opening movie, which isn't subtitled.  ~_~;;;  You can find a subtitled version on youtube, however) where all the princess candidates are killed off, except your daughter.  Cube takes her away to Japan, wipes her memories of the other world, and gives her to you, a retired hero in self exile.  You're given the standard 8 years and when they're up, the girl can decide to go back to her original world or live a normal life in modern Japan.

Unlike previous games, you can play a father or mother this time around.  There's also a ton of new stuff, like setting her weekly schedule on what she does.  She MUST go to school regardless, but she can work part time, take lessons, join clubs.  She has a monthly schedule that will affect her personality, how thin/fat she can get, how she thinks and interacts with people around her.  You can go around the town on Sundays, wheither to visit friends, take a rest from stress, go to the movies, buy her items, etc.  You also have access to a chibi form of her in her own room where she interacts with things based on what you buy for her, her own personality, and hobbies.

Seriously, the game got so much more involved than previous versions that it would take me a long time to type up and even then, I have yet to uncover everything after nearly 60 hours of gameplay.  It's a huge game that can keep you occupied for hours on end.

Ventures are very watered down compared to PM2, you can't wander around an area anymore, but you basically go to an area, beat up some monsters, fight a boss, and boom.  It's simple, but there's many ways to combat besides just swinging your sword or casting a spell.  You can take away an enemy's fighting spirit by having a high dance ability or if you have a high language ability, you can talk your way out of a fight.  I kinda miss PM2's little walk around, but it doesn't hurt the game.

Now the bad, the localization of this game is downright awful.  And this isn't counting just the translation either.

The translation is awful.  This is really a shame since there was a fanpatch going around before this released, which is a much better english translation.  Why the heck CFK didn't get in contact with the fantranslation is beyond me.  CFK was told several times to get a native english translator, and it appears they hadn't listened at all and are just fixing errors on the fly and using their customers as their beta testers.  The descriptions of stats are confusing and the dialogue is riddled with stilted text along with typos and times where the kids call my daughter 'Mother' instead of her name.  Also, characters are calling each other by their first name, when the audio is clearing using their last name.  

This game is riddled with more bugs than the fantranslation, who didn't even have a programmer, that I want to facepalm hard.  Items are bugged (Items don't work, items don't raise secondary stats), Achievements are bugged (Bride achievement is not activating when I had my daughter marry Ootome in another run), text is bugged or goes out of the box, everything costs 10 times more than in the original game (I seriously don't understand this choice at all), starting the game triggers some people's virus protections, and the list goes on and on.

It's a shame because Princess Maker 5 is my favorite of the Princess Maker games, the characters are charming, I enjoy the setting, and your daughter is super cute.  But a bad localization can destroy a good game.  This is a perfect example of it yet again, like Princess Maker 3.  Though unlike Princess Maker 3, CFK is trying, but honestly, if you're not going to put in effort in the first place, then give it to someone who will.  This is already a niche series, all you're going to do with laziness like this is turn off people who may want to get into it and drive people who are fans up the wall.  ~_~;;  If this translation does get polished and the bugs fixed, I'll change it, but right now, I'd say buy the Japanese version and use the fan translation.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100506936', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 805, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 805, 'last_played': 1536976661}
review:
I grew up on PM2 and thoroughly enjoyed playing it again on steam. However, I cannot in good conscience recommend this title.

As of 5/26/18, the translation is still terrible. It looks like a combined effort between an online translator and a person who has zero understanding of basic vocab and sentence structure of English. While context helps put things into picture, it noticibly takes away from the experience. 

Unlike its predecessors, I found the gameplay to be extremely slow and tedious. This isn't to say that there were no repetitive elements in the previous installments. The generic formula of fattening/strengthening your daughter early while piling up money/winning events to be splurged on lessons and items still holds true for all princess makers. The problem is that PM5 forces you to go through the schedule on a weekly basis. Once you extend the curfew, you're basically staring at the same scenes over and over again while clicking away until the dreaded Sunday arrives. At first, it will seem overwhelming due to the sheer number of options available to you in town. Fear not! Whether it's going to the same type of events year after year to reduce stress/raise an attribute or visiting certain areas to have the same conversation with a friend, this too will become mundane very quickly.

The micro in this game wore me out, not because it was challenging, but because it was repetitive and boring.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066829936', 'num_games_owned': 86, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1526648227}
review:
최악의 해상도... 오래전에 만들어진 게임이라 하더라도 리마스터는 하고 나와야 하지 않았나 생각된다.
시스템적으로 불편한 것들도 개선되지 않은 채 그대로 이식되었다.
대화로그조차 존재하지 않고 불친절한 게임 시스템은 그대로...
열심히 할 이유가 존재하지 않는 게임

author: {'steamid': '76561198093089901', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1625385683}
review:
英文版无法给女儿取汉字名字，好不爽。哪怕是日文版都比英文版玩的没有违和感啊。
就算没有中文版，给我日文版也可以啊！不过撇开这些抱怨，PM5是我最喜欢的一代，因为最贴近生活.
只是小学时代感觉是最好玩的，长大了之后就开始每周感觉乏味了。
最后说一句我是来补票的~希望更多人体验下这款游戏

author: {'steamid': '76561198374048887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5828, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1702268262}
review:
윈도우 10을 쓰게 된 이후 프메5를 못하게 된지 약 5년 이상이 지났는데 스팀으로 출시 되었다는 소식을 늦게나마 접해서 구매해보았습니다.

+내용수정

처음에는 화면크기가 적당했는데, 풀스크린 해보려고 하니까 오류로 화면이 안보여서 다시  켜봤더니 800X600으로 고정되어 버렸었습니다만 강제로 화면을 크게 해주는 프로그램도 없고 해서 그냥 플레이 하려다가호환성 문제인가 싶어서 이것저것 눌러봤더니 화면 크기가 돌아왔네요!
혹시 저같은 문제를 겪고 계신 분들을 위해 적어봅니다. (윈도우 10 홈버젼 기준입니다)

프메5를 실행하시고 화면 맨 아래쪽에 실행창에 떠있는 프메를 오른쪽클릭 하시면  PM5포함 3개가 표시되는데, PM5를 다시 오른쪽 클릭하시면 맨 아래 속성버튼이 있습니다.
왼쪽클릭하시면 뜨는 창에 호환성 탭에 들어가시면 아래쪽에 설정칸에 높은 DPI 조정 동작을 재정의합니다. 라는 글 옆에 있는 체크를 풀어주시고 적용시킨 뒤 프메를 다시 실행시켜주시면 원래 크기로 실행됩니다.
아직 크기만 조정하고 제대로 플레이해보지를 못해서 이 후 어떤 오류가 발생할 지는 저도 모릅니다 ㅠ 그래도 일단 답답한 해상도 문제를 해결하고나니 기분은 좋네요!
오류 발견시 다시 수정하러 오겠습니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561198208162867', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2319, 'last_played': 1562759678}
review:
39시간 엔딩봤습니다. 이게임을 구매하시기 전에 장단점을 이야기해드리자면...

장점
1. 세밀한 육성이 가능하다. 
2. 인물관계 다양한 이벤트등 보는 재미도 있다.
3. 단시간 플레이 보다 좀더 장시간 몰입을 원한다면 추천합니다.
4. 육성 시뮬레이션을 좋아하신다면 한번은 해볼만 합니다.
    성우 목소리 듣는맛도 있으니 추천.


단점
1. 8년이라는 시간이 상당히 길다면 길다 (엔딩을 볼려면 장시간을 각오해야한다)

2. 인물관계 친밀도에 상당히 문제가 많다.

예를 들자면 케릭터를 만나면 호감도가 상승하게 되는데, 
호감도 상승폭 에 비해 한주만 지나도 수치가 떨어지는게 보인다
굳이 만나는데 도 상대방이 싫어하는 사람과도 친밀하면 관련되서 호감도 떨어질때도 있습니다.
이게 상당히 스트레스 인데 , 게임내 등장하는 케릭터 들과 전부 친하려면, 
일요일에만 만나는게 가능한데 , 연인관계나 친한 친구에게 일요일 약속을 잡아버리면 
그만큼 관리하는데에 힘들수 있습니다.시간 투자를 해야합니다.

엔딩을 보면서 한케릭터에게 절교통보3번도 받았습니다.

+절교 통보를 받으면 상당한 시간을 투자해야 하므로 주의를 해야합니다.
  (친구 조사를 클릭하면 관계도 가 뜨는데 회색구슬에 깨져있는 상태면 언제든지  절교날릴 준비가 되어 있다는겁니다.)

거기에 케릭터마다 호감도 하향폭이 큰케릭터도 있습니다.
케릭터마다 일정시간에 출연장소가 있으니 검색해보고 해보세요

인물관계를 원만하게 가지려면 상당히 휴일에 투자를 해야 합니다.
공지란에 나오는 콘서트 이벤트 등을 이용하면 스트레스를 해소 해주며 , 관련된 스텟도 소폭올려줍니다만
투자 대비 인물관계 투자를 하는게 좋습니다.
(단 해변청소는 도덕심을 올려주니 필요할시 이용하세요 1년에 2~3달정도 뜨는듯 합니다.)
스트레스 해소 는 거진 약국 또는 데이트로 해소 하는게 좋다.

3. 스텟수치에 대비해 너무 높으면 이벤트가 생략되는 부분도 있는거 같다.
    필요 요건 수치가 넘으면 정신없게 관련된 이벤트가 여러번 뜨기 때문에 
    하고자 하는 엔딩으로 갈려면 주의가 필요합니다
    스킵하다 이벤트를 모르고 넘겨 버릴수 있으니 이것도 주의해야합니다.

  * 두서 없이 적었습니다만 플레이하시는데 참고 되셨으면 좋겠습니다.
     그리고 꼭 세이브는 자주 하는게 좋습니다.!

author: {'steamid': '76561198006795437', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 2174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1337, 'last_played': 1527297197}
review:
Recommend IF you're a fan of the princess maker series and want to continue.  This is NOT the place for newcomers to start!  There is the occasional bug, I haven't hit many of them but I admit that can make it all the more jaring and disapointing when the game crashes.  The translation is... adequet for a veteran.  With what they provide and a vague understanding of Japanese culture it's pretty easy to get by, especially if you're already familiar with how Princess Maker works.  If you don't have either of those you're in trouble.

I think I have to echo the general sentiment around here.  If you're just starting the series go back to Princess Maker 2, it's excellent and much easier to understand.  If you're a veteran I think PM5 might just be the better game we've always wanted, I'll have to play this a little more and get over the PM2 fatigue I've had for a few years to be sure.

review: 재미있는데... 아쉬운 점은 ㅠㅠ 구매할 때 한 번에 여러개 구매를 못하는 게 진짜 불편하네요..볼륨이 큰 게 단점일 수도 있지만- 전 프메시리즈도 거의 1번? 2번 정도밖에 안 해서 ㅎㅎ 자잘한 이벤트가 많은 게 더 좋네요 ㅎㅎ반복적인 거 싫어하는 분들은 비추!

author: {'steamid': '76561198159444830', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2585, 'last_played': 1526278911}
review:
처음 발매되었을 때 시디를 사서 재미있게 플레이했던 기억이 있어 반가운 마음에 플레이해보았습니다~ 그때도 하루종일 붙들고 앉아서 게임을 했었는데 이번에 구매해서도 그렇게 했네요 ^^ 
플레이타임은 다른 시리즈보다 월등히 많지만 그래도 진짜 내자식 키운다는 마음으로 열심히 키웠습니다~ 

그런데 엔딩본 후 갤러리가 오픈된 것을 확인해보니 획득한 이벤트 이미지가 왜 뜨지 않는걸까요?? 업데이트 통해서 꼭꼭꼭!! 개선되기를 바랍니다.

이번에 진프린세스랑 세이브 다시 돌려서 여배우로 만드는데 성공했는데 다음에 할 때는 제딸이 연애의 여왕이 될 수 있게 플레이해봐야 겠습니다~

author: {'steamid': '76561198009132682', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2975, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1488, 'last_played': 1674914258}
review:
First and foremost, the translation is terrible. Yeah, you can figure out most of it, but is that what you should have to do in a professional release? 

The issues range from simple stiff dialogue (almost everything) to bad Google Translate (daughter's journal). Some items even have a totally opposite translation ("can't wear after" when it should be "can't wear UNTIL after"). 

Is the game playable? Yes, completely. However, part of the charm of a daughter-raising sim is interacting with your daughter and those around her. Simply having a native English speaker edit the game script would change Princess Maker 5 from "Well, at least we got it" to "Absolutely amazing."

For the game itself, it can feel too long for something with so many endings. The grind for stats is pretty extreme and the "good" endings all require the same ones (Charisma, Elegance, Attractiveness). If you miss the cut-off the first time around you'll be holding down CTRL for years of Ballet and Tea Ceremony all over again. 

What PM5 does well, however, is a great sense of realism in raising your daughter. Her friends get jealous over her 
hanging out with other kids, she proudly brings you a report card every semester, and you even have to deal with the terrible puberty phase (you'll wanna call your own parent and apologize for being 13). These little interactions are what make me actually recommend this poorly translated, sometimes buggy game. Outside of raising your own kid, this is the only way to have the ultimate parenting experience. 

I almost felt guilty for making her work at the bar, but those tea lessons aren't free. 

Hopefully updates will continue to pour in for PM5 and the experience will be improved.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129715884', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2098, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1617285548}
review:
과거의 향수를 느낄 수 있는 게임. 
하지만 번역자막의 오류라던가 오류로 인해 게임 화면을 정상적으로 꺼도 게임에 오류가 있다고 뜸.
어제도 구매하고 게임을 하던 첫 딸도 오류로 날아감.
아무리 이식판 이라고 그래도 여러 버그를 조금 고쳐주었으면 싶음.
나는 과거의 그 재미를 느끼고 싶어서 구매하고 플레이하는 게임인데 오류때문에 과거의 재미고 머고 프린세스 메이커 5 특유의 긴 플레이 타임을 감수하고 싶은 마음이 사라지기 시작함.

얼른 제작자가 오류 수정을 해주었으면 좋겠다...

author: {'steamid': '76561198312257803', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 12431, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2615, 'last_played': 1680444359}
review:
다른 분들은 화면이 작다고 하는데 저는 플레이에 지장이 있을 정도로 작지는 않았어요

저는 창모드로 플레이 하는데 아예 상단에 메뉴가 안 떠서 불편했는데 
게임 내 설정에서 조절 가능한 부분들이라 알고 나서는 불편함도 없었습니다

예전에 발매된 CD 버전과 차이점이 하나도 없다고 보면 될 정도로 똑같습니다만..
치트오매틱이나 에디터 사용은 안 되는 것 같습니다

에디터 사용을 막았으면 대량 구매는 가능하게 해 줬으면 싶었는데 아직 구현이 안 됐네요
템 버리는 건 대량으로 버릴 수 있는 걸 보니까 구매도 하면 될 것 같은데 얘네가 귀찮은 것 같음

플레이 시간이 오래 걸리고 스트레스 조절, 친우 관계 등은 예전 발매 때 이미 지옥을 알아서 저는 크게 하드함 모르겠어요..

불법적인 다운로드는 어차피 윈도우 7 이상 64 비트 이상에서 플레이가 안 되니
이번 기회에 정식으로 구매하여 해 보세요 ^^ 

요약: 십 년 전이랑 똑같음
게임 진행이 느리다는 분들 컨트롤 눌러서 빨리 돌리고 조절하면서 하세요

author: {'steamid': '76561198047527524', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 971, 'last_played': 1598434177}
review:
기존의 트레이너는 막혔지만 치트엔진은 사용가능 합니다. 그런데 스트레스의 경우는 소수점까지 내려가서 치트엔진이 안먹히는것 처럼 보이지만 실제론 잘 돌아갑니다.
스트레스가 10.50이라고 치면 치트엔진에 1050으로 검색하면 나옵니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198209319167', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 8638, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7294, 'last_played': 1704499927}
review:
J'ai passé un très bon moment de jouer à Princess Maker 5. Le jeu est dans l'ensemble est très bien réalisé même si il y'a quelques problèmes de bugs et de textes dans les dialogues. Heureusement, ce sont des petits problèmes mineurs sans que cela ne nuit au gameplay.

Princess Maker 5 est un mélange de Princess Maker 2 et 3 sur Saturn. Sa partie gestion est plus proche à celle de Princess Maker 3, tandis que sa partie rpg est plus proche à celle de Princess Maker 2. Le scénario principal a été très bien travailler mettant que le personnage principal qui vient à l'origine de l'époque médieval a été envoyer dans l'époque moderne pour échapper à des démons qui veulent la tuer dans le but d'éliminer la dernière candidate qui pourrait devenir une princesse. En début de partie, nous avons plus l'impression de jouer à un pur jeu de gestion sur la simulation de vie. Mais dès que notre fille a ses 12 ans, c'est à ce moment que les vraies choses sérieuses commence quand uns des assassins se manifeste pour tenter de la tuer. La héroïne retrouvera à ce moment la mémoire sur la tragédie de sa vraie famille qui ont étés assassinés par des démons et que c'est à ce moment que mode Adventure est disponible et que le joueur est libre de son choix si il veut faire d'elle une princesse ou non. 

Graphiquement, le jeur est très beau. Les personnages ont étés bien dessinés et donnent l'impression de lire un mangas, les musiques sont de très bonnes qualités et agréable à écouter. Par contre, les voix des personnages sont trop fortes. Elles cassent un peu les oreilles. Heureusement, on peut les désactivé dans les options. La jouabilité est très bonne et facile à prendre en main. La souris se déplace très bien. Il n' y a pas de problème de ralentissement, ni de lourdeur. Le niveau de difficulté est bien équilibré. On n'a pas de difficulté de géré les activités de notre fille pour la partie gestion dans le but de l'éduquer pour soit en faire une princesse ou pour qu'elle obtienne une carrière normal ou en faire une super héroïne. La durée de vie est très bonne. Vous passerrez de nombreuses heures de jouer à ce fort titre. Il y'a tellement de nouvelles fonctionnalités que cela vous prendra plusieurs parties pour faire le tour complet du jeu. Que ce soit pour maitriser la partie gestion ou rpg pour tenter de faire progresser le scénario. Princess Maker 5 est un très bon jeu que je recommande à tout ceux qui ont aimés jouer à Princess Maker 2 et 3.

author: {'steamid': '76561198387053381', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1470, 'last_played': 1526675639}

author: {'steamid': '76561198280108358', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 3927, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 608, 'last_played': 1634000270}
review:
I would reccommend playing a different game in the series- maybe PM2 before this one to see if you like it. If you like any of the other iterations, you'll like PM5. This game is the best in the series by FAR, the most detailed and expanded on. It takes a long time to play through just one of the routes, and there's more endings than PM2 so you'll definitley get your money's worth out of it. I really reccommend PM5. 

I will say, there is some translation issues and a few bugs. For example, don't make your game fullscreen or it might crash. But in a game THIS large, of course it'll have those issues compared to the rest. It's like 5x the size at least of other titles. If you can put up with the translation, I'd get it. Save every couple weeks in case something happens. But as for the game itself, I definitley would suggest trying it out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060919857', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 5684, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2519, 'last_played': 1710170957}
review:
A very good game, maybe the best PM! But not for endings, the game lacks of complementary endings, more it will be perfert. I've got the endding soldier (2.5/5) with a lot of max stats everywhere like INTE, ANALYC, LANGUAGE... A PM5 refine patch with adding more enddings to complement each category would be cool (cf PM3 (soldier-commander-general)).

Vraiment un excellent jeu, peut être même le meilleur PM! Sauf pour la fin, il manque cruellement de fins complémentaires pour que cela soit parfait. J'ai eu en fin simple soldat alors qu'elle avait des stats max de partout comme INTE, ANALYC, LANGUAGE... Un patch Refine PM5 avec un ajout de plus de fins pour développer les corps de metiers serait top (cf PM3 (soldier-commander-general)).

author: {'steamid': '76561198256172204', 'num_games_owned': 233, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 5155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2717, 'last_played': 1528022819}
review:
Princess Maker 2,3のプレイ経験者です。懐かしさで購入しました。
5では1周のプレイ時間が非常に長いようですね。
スケジュール管理が1週間毎で、コマ数がとても多いです。
20時間をプレイして、ようやく13歳の冬を迎えました。18歳まではまだまだ時間がかかりそうです。
イベントも多いので、育成過程が好きな人には良いでしょう。
いろいろなエンディングを収集することには、疲れてしまうかもしれません。

author: {'steamid': '76561198142872960', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1152, 'last_played': 1557241637}
review:
열 살이지만 아르바이트를 해서 스스로 돈을 벌어야 하고 학업성적도 좋아야하며 휴일에는 온종일 친구들을 스토킹한다. 하물며 스트레스를 해소하는 길은 오로지 약뿐이다! 정신력으로 버티는 '딸'과 현실시간을 쏟아붓는 '나'의 콜라보레이션.

개인적으로 플레이타임만 좀 줄어들었으면 하는 바램이 있네요. 모험과 휴일이 별도의 스케줄로 짜여졌으면 좋겠고. 그리고 친구들 그만 절교하러와. 제발.

author: {'steamid': '76561198148631706', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 893, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 893, 'last_played': 1527309640}
review:
프린세스 메이커를 처음 플레이해보는 입장에서 솔직하게 평가를 써봅니다.
플레이 상황은 정확한 공략은 모르는 체로 기본적인 시스템만 숙지하고 막 1년을 넘긴 후입니다.

1. 게임의 배경은 '한국'이 아니고 더구나 딸내미도 '한국인'이 아니므로 빡빡한 스케줄은 딸을 혹사시키게 되니 주의합시다. 우리의 딸은 어떤 상황에서도 걸핏하면 스트레스를 받아버리는 섬세한 멘탈의 소유자입니다. 덕분에 주말 대부분의 시간을 스트레스를 40이나 줄일 수 있는 유원지에서 보내게 됩니다. 틈틈히 나오는 히어로쇼 이벤트로 매니아 올리기는 덤.

2.현실에서도 마찬가지이듯 돈이 진리입니다. 예를 들어 학교에서 배워서 지능을 채우는 것보다는 차라리 지출을  통해 책을 몇번 쥐어주는 것이 딸에게 더 도움될 것입니다. 그렇다고 능력치를 올리는 아이템들이 싼 가격은 아닌지라 무리한 지출은 지양해야합니다.  아빠가 쥐꼬리 월급이라 미안해 ㅠㅠ

3. 친구관계를 형성하기가 너무 어렵습니다. 친구 이벤트가 나오는 내내 말을 걸어봤지만 1년이 지나도 딸은 왕따 그 자체...

4. 주말에 외출로 보낼 수 있는 시간이 생각보다 빠듯합니다. 또한 주변의 소문같은 것을 통해 이벤트의 힌트를 들을 수 있지만 정말 하드하게 게임을 하는 사람이 아닌 이상 보통은 무시하거나 지나치게 될겁니다. 만약 과도한 완벽주의자이거나 나는 이벤트를 하나도 빼먹지 않고싶다라고 하는 사람들은 매주마다 신경을 써줍시다. 

6. 이식판이라서 그런지 간간히 버그 또는 거슬리는 것들이 눈에 보입니다. 타이틀에 찍혀있는 손가락 커서는 빨리 수정됬으면 좋겠네요.


저는 평가가 복합적인 것치고는 정말 재미있게 하고 있습니다. 엔딩을 보기까지의 분량이 분량이다보니 성질 급한 사람들에게는 추천드리지 않습니다. 딸이 성장하는 모습을 느긋하게 바라볼 수 있는 미덕을 가진 사람들에게 추천합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038208353', 'num_games_owned': 494, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 12599, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1438, 'last_played': 1710020880}
review:
UPDATE 2: The only remaining bugs that I have consistently encountered are the comic book festival crash and not being able to see the opening movie on some devices. The second one is probably a video card issue. The comic book festival is avoidable. This only applies to the English version of the game. The Japanese version of the game does not crash at the comic book festival.

UPDATE:  Most major glitches have been fixed.  The remaining glitches are the crash at the comic festival, some achievements not triggering, and possibly the Water of Life and High/Low Fat Milk/Fairy Bra not working.  It's worth mentioning that the Fairy Bra and High Fat Milk are only cosmetic changes to the artwork.

Princess Maker 5 is the final and best game in the Princess Maker series.  You can now choose to be a father or a mother instead of being forced into a father's role.  The schedule is now weekly instead of monthly.  This means you can have your daughter work at the bookstore for one week and switch her job to babysitting the next.  Since Princess Maker 5 takes place in modern times, your daughter now goes to school Monday through Saturday.  You can choose a club you want your daughter to take or not let her join a club at all.  There are tons of endings, but she can't get a marriage ending if she gets a career ending and vice versa.  The parent's job can bring stable income every month or random income every month.  The random income option will select an amount in April and that will be the amount you get paid until April of the next year.  The new friendship mechanics are interesting and realistic.  Being friends with Hitoshi means Kenichi will be harder to befriend.  Most NPCs like certain clothing.  Kenichi likes the flowing clothes and Kousei like the cool clothes.  All of the marriage candidates are available to meet in one game.  You need to do certain actions to meet some of the characters such as accepting Mouri's scouting event in order to meet Leona and Shinya.  Some endings require being in the same club for three years in a row.

Now that the basics are out of the way, let's talk about the technical details.  This is a long game.  It can take three to five hours to get through one year.  Your daughter's stats will rise slowly to accomodate the new weekly schedule.  There are some major glitches that are in the process of being fixed.  The sweet potato festival and ability to join the comic club currently crash the game for some people.  Fullscreen is glitched, don't even try it.  Money is advertised at the wrong price in the newspaper.  Some achievements don't work.  Since it's just after launch, we can expect the major glitches to be fixed at a later date.

Finally, the translation.  I'm going to be honest with you.  It's bad.  An example of it would be "On the way to school  Hitoshi saw..." when it should say "Saw Hitoshi on the way to school."  With that said, the translation is understanable in its current form, but it clearly wasn't translated by someone who knew enough English to translate it.

Do I recommend this game?  Well, since I can get past the translation errors and smaller bugs, yes.  Princess Maker 5 is officially in English for the first time.  That's a huge achievement for a niche series.  There may not be another official translation.  However, if you're looking for a perfectly translated game with no bugs, then this game is probably not for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065538768', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 3640, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 922, 'last_played': 1578874871}
review:
"Yeah, I'll just play for a couple hours today and go do something productive."

*10 hours later* "........Well then."

Hella addicting game, if you liked the previous princess maker games you will probably like this one. Yes, it is a little rough with translations (as we knew it probably would be) and a few crashes (save often!) But it's my favorite in the series so far. Since it just recently came out, you might want to wait a bit to buy it if bugs/translation issues really bother you. It's all in english and you can generally work out what they're trying to say though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064382623', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 981, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 981, 'last_played': 1525656250}
review: I normally don't review games, but this one is worth my horrible written words. Some people might be worried about the translation based on the past PCM releases, but so far, this is the best job yet. Not only id the gameplay its self a major step up from PCM3, the translation is as well. I have only noticed a few flubs compared to the other games. It still has an odd tone, but it is fully understandable and wholly playable. It is a much longer game too, with much more options and events, and I have never once been confused as to whats going on. If youre a fan of PCM2 and 3 give rhis one a shot as well!

author: {'steamid': '76561198054964194', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 1157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 592, 'last_played': 1549252391}
review:
A little bit confusing in terms of UI. But if you liked the whole raise your daughter idea then this'll be a nice modern treat. Though I wish the descriptions told me a bit more of what some places did or how to really tend and take care of my daughter, but in a way the game is built upon trial and error. So in truth your first daughter will be a bit rough around the edges, but play enough and learn what you can do to min-max stats and relationships, it all comes around to just how you act. 

And note that this is a ten year old starting off, asking why she gets stressed easily or why she can't do really well at part time jobs is kinda silly when you say it out loud.


Would I say it's worth the asking price? Depends really if you liked- say PM2 (Princess Maker 2) Then you will obviously enjoy this game, as said before it is very complex starting out but after awhile everything sort of smooths out. It certainly is worth the price then and honestly it's why I bought it. 

But lets say you have no idea what this genre of games is, then I'd say buy PM2 so you'll have a better idea of the genre, it's cheaper anyway and THEN you can decide if you want to buy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198328519378', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 687, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1676706506}
review:
코딱지만한 화면이라는 리뷰를 봤었지만 그래도 꼭 플레이하고 싶어서 구입했는데...

프메2 리파인도 이 정도는 아니었어요.
이건 디스플레이 배율을 높여도 작은 건 뭘까요...
눈이 아파서 플레이할 수가 없네요.
한달 스케쥴도 실행해보지 못하고 환불받으러 갑니다.
진짜 '실행'만 되게 한 버전이네요.
매우 매우 실망입니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147735519', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2424, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2236, 'last_played': 1602653405}
review:
EDIT: I'm choosing to redact my negative review. I've been thinking it over for a bit. I've poured a lot of time into this game already, and I think it deserves another review.

This game is honestly a lot of fun, and I don't have the best relationship with CFK. They have a history of poor translations and then completely abandoning maintenance or fixes on the game. BUT. It seems that this time they are making a good faith effort to do a little better. A few things here and there have been fixed, which I appreciate- and this is one step toward popularizing localization of niche games, so I'm happy enough. I'm still a little bitter that they refuse to hire any english speakers or even accept free help that's been offered by the community, but it is what it is, and this is an amazing game. 

Game: 9/10
Translation: 4/10

------------------------END EDIT-----------------------------------------------------

I'm a huge fan of the Princess Maker series and really any game of this genre. That's why having to write this review is so unforunate. I've been waiting for a very long time for an english translation of the game, but this is actually horrid. I'm not just talking general poor grammar or synatx, that would be expected and fine. I think this might be a hasty machine translation. Some things are completely unreadable and completely impossible to parse meaning from. The stat names are not self explanatory. The tutorial is so poorly translated that it is useless. This is particularly a problem because this game is renowned for being challenging, and there are no english guides to the game. So if you can't read the tutorial, and there are no guides, you're essentially screwed.

From what little I've been able to play of the game so far, it's an absolute blast. The art is cute, the characters are interesting, and the activities are varied. But god it's near impossible to figure out what I'm doing with such a poor translation. PLEASE polish it, for the love of god. I really want to enjoy this game, and I really want to support overseas translations, but it's hard to when you get sentences like "you Michiru      saw on way   home" (yes the excessive spaces included, which keys me into it probably being an unedited machine translation). 

I'm serious about polishing it though. If an update comes out (god I hope) with updated translation, updated stats names, and a bit more polishing, I will actually walk on my hands and knees to a monestary in calcutta to join a nunnery. That's how bad I want this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032544384', 'num_games_owned': 3271, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 3092, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1759, 'last_played': 1526661726}

author: {'steamid': '76561198255471114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2913, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2901, 'last_played': 1575091089}
review:
그야말로 단순 이식판...물론 불법적인 수단임으로 자랑스럽게 이야기할 것이 못되지만 에뮬로 화질조절이 가능한 PSP판이 더 나을 지경 전체화면으로 플레이할 경우 눈이 아파온다. 

게임성은 이미 발매한지 10년이 넘은 게임임으로 더 말할 필요도 없겠지만 구태여 말하자면 길다...다회차 플레이를 강요하는 게임주제에 기본플레이 시간이 앵간한 JRPG급이다.플레이가 RPG급으로 꽉차있으면 단순히 볼륨이 지나칠 정도로 풍부한 게임이라 평할 수 있겠지만, 프메5의 경우에는 단순 반복 작업의 연속이라는 것이 문제다.물론 이전작들과 달리 현대시대를 배경으로 하여 공감되는 부분도 있고 좀더 흥미로운 부분이 있긴 하지만, 지나친 플레이 시간은 마이너스요소다.

만약 가이낙스나 CFK가 일련의 프린세스메이커 시리즈 복각으로 시리즈 부활의 호응을 재고 있거나 이미 후속작을 기획중이라면 제발 프메 5의 단점을 해결하면서도 장점을 계승한 작품을 만들어줬으면 좋겠다.

추억이 있는 사람은 구매해볼만 하다
그렇지 않은 사람은 그냥 3하자.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997537239', 'num_games_owned': 736, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 3504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 786, 'last_played': 1529453492}
review:
A repetitive, grindy raise-'em-up (this should be a genre), fifth in the series. The localization/translation is honestly really not very good at all, so don't buy it if that bothers you.

It's charming and there's an insane amount of depth here, if you're willing to struggle to make sense of all the bizarre, obscure systems and the poor translation job. The art is super cute and the writing shows a lot of charm despite feeling awkward. This is definitely a niche game for a certain kind of person, though, and if you aren't that kind of person you are going to get bored quick before any of the stat-raising systems even begin to show real results or changes. It's sloooooow.

Tons of replay value if you are, though, with a bunch of different classmates and folks to befriend, as well as different outcomes depending on how you raise the little lady.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142386303', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1525517727}

I asked for now a refund because this game deserve more polish! It has so many new features, so many new events and even a proper relationship systems... author: {'steamid': '76561198313470114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7867, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 612, 'last_played': 1698335821}
review:
어렸을 때 프메 5를 정말 재밌게 했었는데 64비트에서 실행이 안 돼서 되게 속상했었는데 스팀판으로 나와서 다행이네요.
전체화면에서 상단에 마우스 가져다 대면 멈춘다는 분 계시는데 저도 그래서 빡쳐하다가 alt+Q 누르면 정상으로 된다는 거 알았어요.(이유는 모름;;) 참고하세요.

단점
많이 알려져 있다만 플탐이 조올라게 길어요. 이게 단점으로 작용하는 이유가, 프메 시리즈는 반복플레이로 엔딩을 수집하는 게 매력이기 때문에..... 또 딸내미 스트레스 관리가 힘든 편이긴 하지만, 초등학교 때 통금 5시로 해놓고 체력 키우는 데 열중하면 중학교때는 그래도 살만해집니다.
인맥관리는...ㅋㅋㅋ 개같기로 유명하니까 할많하않

장점
어머니가 선택 가능해졌고, 딸이 사귈 수 있는 친구들도 많이 늘어나고, 그에 따른 이벤트도 세세하게 짜는 등 게임 볼륨이 굉장히 늘어났어요. 문어발플레이 하는 재미도 쏠쏠합니다.
그리고 딸내미가 넘 귀여워여

추억보정도 어느정도 들어갔지만, 점수로는 7.6/10 정도 주고 싶네요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172618093', 'num_games_owned': 549, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 3976, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3737, 'last_played': 1575622780}
review:
美5的文本与选项对我来说早已烂熟于胸，暂时没中文也不影响任何游戏体验，况且看看“美小女梦工厂”这几个字，我也不期望CFK的中文翻译能有什么质量。
可是这个steam版，竟然很神奇地以BUG制BUG，封掉了儿童公园捡垃圾这么一个开局。所有捡到的持有道具都不会增加属性，扔掉同人志也不增加精神力。把捡到的娃娃玩偶扔掉，爱心不会有任何变动，但是压力会瞬间999爆表。
不得不说，GAINAX……不，CFK在处置BUG的方面上，连育碧也难以望其项背。至少育碧是在修一个BUG之后，才出现了新的BUG，而不是根本不修，反倒用另外的BUG去堵前一个BUG。07年的游戏，时隔10年，怎么还能出现新BUG呢。

*附1：生命之水有BUG！无法在战斗中使用！！这意味着就算满属性，也只能拿脸去打阿尔冯特。

*附2：英文版存在着各种缺字的现象。

*附3：目前看来部分属性不受持有类道具影响是一个共性BUG，无论是+1的护腕或是+10的推销员道具购买后都无法对精神力产生任何影响。简而言之，[b]这个游戏是难以正常游玩的。[/b]

*附4：所有商品的价格都翻了十倍，但是开宝箱获得的金钱还是原额。

*附5：仍然有着多到惊人的BUG，例如和特定怪物对话会游戏崩溃，天帝之杖装备后弹出错误对话框等。出现全屏BUG请按alt+回车切换回窗口模式。

author: {'steamid': '76561198133949057', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1525502006}

author: {'steamid': '76561198334668214', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1077, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1639725699}
review:
So its finally here, and in many ways, Princess Maker 5 is the best game in the series. It takes several elements of all the previous games and in general improves upon what worked well, and streamlines some of the less enjoyable aspects of the series. Not all of its innovations are complete success however, and some of these can lean more on the side of tedium. More on the good and the bad below.

Pros+
+The friendship system introduced in Princess Maker 3 has been expanded on and now plays into more elaborate in game events that can have an effect on your Daughter's day to day schedule and offer you a variety of benefits in the form of items and stress relief. Male relationships can result in becoming potential love interests if you so desire.

+Similiar to Princess Maker 3's mood system, Princess Maker 5 has revamped them into your daughter's actual peronsality, which can be influenced based of her upbringing. And unlike Princess Maker 3, these states are generally much less intrusive as to how you can influence your daughter's schedule. There are exceptions of course, like the rebellious, lazy, and the sick are all generally a pain to deal with.

+Adventuring has returned from Princess Maker 2, but is now heavily streamlined into an automatic process which your only input is when your daughter happens across enemy encounters. Her non combat skill are also made slightly more relevant for combat purposes, but not in any major way.

+Your daughter's wardrobe and physical appearance has a larger variety of different states compared to previous games, Things don't get crazy, but its nice to have more options in general.

+The introduction of playing as a Mother and the ability to choose your caretakers career are nice additions and allow for a different perspective and the ability to have more control over your funds. Not a major difference, but again, nice to have.

+On Sundays, you know have the option of taking your daughter out various locations in the games world, restaurants and shops are the most prominent, but you can also bump into her friends to help boost relationships and partake in various holiday events and entertainment to build stats in addition to the classic education and profession approach.

Hit and Miss=

=Princess Maker 5 is by far the longest game in the series, due in part to both her schedule being filled out on a weekly basis instead of monthly. Optimal play will require you to make use of visiting the various games locations. Clicking around the map to visit locations on Sundays will be something you do a lot in this game if you wish to play optimally, and the process of moving around the town isn't necssarily a fast or fun thing to do over the course of a typical playthrough. There are obvious benefits to having a longer game, but Princess Maker 5 is arguably too long for its own good. Thankfully, Town visits can be skipped if you feel so inclined and the stat gains from it can be compensated for with smart schedule planning.

=Adventuring despite the improvements to combat still isn't great. Its nice to see the feature back, but it still isn't particularly engaging or fun. Most fights can be won through mindlessly using basic attacks.

The Bad-

-The UI for Town navigation is slow and like I mentioned above, adds a lot of needless time to Town visits, there is a lot of clicking involved. Even once you have all your favorite locations memorized on the map, the navigation doesn't ever feel great. Its a small nitpick. but its one you will likely come to notice due to the length of the game.

-Maintaining your daughter's relationships with her friends can be tedious due to relationship decay over time. Don't try to actively maintain everyone your daughter meets. Pick 1-3 people you like and just roll with it.

-The Localization could be better, much better actually. But you probably already knew this.

With all that said, Princess Maker 5's innovations to the series are for the most part succesful and rewarding, and as long as you can devote the time to actually finish it, you should have great time with it if you are a fan of the previous games in the series.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965489700', 'num_games_owned': 391, 'num_reviews': 249, 'playtime_forever': 885, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1611670459}
review: Como Fan de la saga, les aconsejo que primero se compren Princess Maker 2 en Steam. ¿Es Princess Maker 5 bueno?, la respuesta es sí, pero es muy lento. El juego cuenta con 50 finales diferentes. Esta lleno de actividades mensuales para distraerte. Como dije, el juego es lento, pero una vez que pasas de la primaria a la secundaria, podes ver crecer a tu hija y sus compañeros de clase, es muy emotivo. Los personajes hablan con voces japonesas en momentos claves. El juego me gusto mucho pero no es nada del mundo. Es para fans muy hardcore que buscan una experiencia extrema. ¿Vale la pena invertir tanto tiempo jugandolo?, sí, por que es tú historia, es diferente para todos. Mi hija hablo con un fantasma. Vimos una película, escuchamos un canto que nos llamo a la playa y resulto ser una Sirena. Son todas experiencias distintas. (hay variedad) La música cambia acorde a los eventos: navidad, primavera, otoño y cuando ella crece, hasta la habitación cambia. (tendras que comprarle ropa nueva).

author: {'steamid': '76561197990032787', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 334, 'last_played': 1525508575}
review: 귀욤이
